mapper.insert: insert into zj_role (role_id, role_name, description, be_permissible, status, delete_flag, add_userid, role_code, add_time, update_time, pid, level_num, pid_str) values (#{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bePermissible,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{levelNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pidStr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update zj_role set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, be_permissible = #{bePermissible,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_userid = #{addUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, role_code = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level_num = #{levelNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid_str = #{pidStr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select role_id, role_name, description, be_permissible, status, delete_flag, add_userid, role_code, add_time, update_time, pid, level_num, pid_str from zj_role where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
